name: spo-open-doc-in-client
title: Open Office documents in the Client
shortDescription: Ensure that Office documents will open in the Client is a such is installed
longDescription: Change is hard. If your customer is used to work from File Share or the local C-drive they are used to Office documents opening in the Client rather than the browser. So enabling the Site Collection Feature Open Document in Client Applications by Default will ensure that this expirience is fairly familiar.  This script sample is an add-on to https://pnp.github.io/script-samples/spo-activate-site-feature/README.html?tabs=pnpps
